mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.service_ip AS "serviceIp", a.service_port AS "servicePort", a.service_name AS "serviceName", a.proxy_server_ip AS "proxyServerIp", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.ftp_ip AS "ftpIp", a.ftp_port AS "ftpPort", a.ftp_username AS "ftpUsername", a.ftp_upwd AS "ftpUpwd", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_service a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.service_ip LIKE '%'||#{serviceIp}||'%' '%'+#{serviceIp}+'%' concat('%',#{serviceIp},'%')
AND a.service_port LIKE '%'||#{servicePort}||'%' '%'+#{servicePort}+'%' concat('%',#{servicePort},'%')
AND a.service_name LIKE '%'||#{serviceName}||'%' '%'+#{serviceName}+'%' concat('%',#{serviceName},'%')
AND a.proxy_server_ip LIKE '%'||#{proxyServerIp}||'%' '%'+#{proxyServerIp}+'%' concat('%',#{proxyServerIp},'%')
AND a.ftp_ip LIKE '%'||#{ftpIp}||'%' '%'+#{ftpIp}+'%' concat('%',#{ftpIp},'%')
AND a.ftp_port LIKE '%'||#{ftpPort}||'%' '%'+#{ftpPort}+'%' concat('%',#{ftpPort},'%')
AND a.ftp_username LIKE '%'||#{ftpUsername}||'%' '%'+#{ftpUsername}+'%' concat('%',#{ftpUsername},'%')
AND a.ftp_upwd LIKE '%'||#{ftpUpwd}||'%' '%'+#{ftpUpwd}+'%' concat('%',#{ftpUpwd},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_service( id, service_ip, service_port, service_name, proxy_server_ip, create_by, ftp_ip, ftp_port, ftp_username, ftp_upwd, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{serviceIp}, #{servicePort}, #{serviceName}, #{proxyServerIp}, #{createBy.id}, #{ftpIp}, #{ftpPort}, #{ftpUsername}, #{ftpUpwd}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_service SET service_ip = #{serviceIp}, service_port = #{servicePort}, service_name = #{serviceName}, proxy_server_ip = #{proxyServerIp}, ftp_ip = #{ftpIp}, ftp_port = #{ftpPort}, ftp_username = #{ftpUsername}, ftp_upwd = #{ftpUpwd}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
